Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.PatientExplodeToggle Class Reference

This class represents the Explode function of the hand menu. With this function, the different segments of the patient e.g. bones, nerves, etc. are separated in space and displayed next to each other. More...

Inheritance diagram for Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.PatientExplodeToggle:

 The time after a button press the button is disabled to prevent bounce effects.
 
float explodeDistance = 5f
 

Detailed Description

This class represents the Explode function of the hand menu. With this function, the different segments of the patient e.g. bones, nerves, etc. are separated in space and displayed next to each other.
